mil3.4.1:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, is it possible, having repeatedly analysed these mental states that are of the nature to arise together, to declare a difference between them, saying ‘this is contact, this is feeling, this is perception, this is intention, this is consciousness, this is applied thought, this is examination’?”
mil3.4.1:4.1: Question on Analysing Contact, Etc. first
